name: THE TRIP - a short film
blurb: A dark, twisting tale of forbidden love, starring Sope Dirisu (The Mill, Utopia) and Gillian Saker (Misfits, Ripper Street)

name: Following Oaks - a short thriller/murder mystery film
blurb: Daniel Oaks is a photographer that puts himself and those around him in grave danger.

blurb:
A female-driven crime thriller...
where everyone's hiding something

name: Sin of the Father
blurb: Sin of the Father is a psychological thriller, exploring religion, fear and how far a person is willing to go for their beliefs

name: FOLLOWING FIVE BUT PRECEDING SEVEN
blurb: A man must solve the mystery of his capture in order to escape from his existential prison.

name: Cats Kill Movie
blurb: Cats Kill is a feature length thriller movie currently raising funds for global digital distribution and film festival submission fees.

name: Return to Fable Grove - A Short Film
blurb: Return to Fable Grove is a psychological thriller with puppets exploring themes of escapism, family and manipulation.

name: ALASKA: Thriller Feature Film
blurb: Female-driven psychological thriller feature film with themes of mindfulness and facing fears

name: All Gone Wrong | Crime Thriller starring Tony Todd
blurb: After a rookie cop is killed in a deal gone wrong, his mentor uncovers a vast narcotics network under the surface of a rural town.

name: "If Only" Short Film
blurb: We are a group of young adults with a vision begging to come to life.

name: Disrupted (an unfinished feature film)
blurb: A tight-knit thriller that festers in the collateral damage of gentrification and race-related tensions rooted in modern day Oakland.

name: In Absentia: A Thriller Feature Film set on Snowdon Mountain
blurb: As a woman learns the truth about the memories she lost, she discovers they might be memories better left forgotten.

name: Dark and Stormy Night - 1st Ever Region Free Blu-Ray Release
blurb: The International Release of Larry Blamire's classic film "Dark and Stormy Night" on Blu-Ray with added features and new short film!

blurb: Short Film

blurb: Drone follows an unnamed female office worker as she is driven to the edge after being passed up for a promotion.

blurb: El proyecto llamado "Luces en la Oscuridad", es una producción mexicana de misterio y suspenso.

name: The Pink Pill - A Short Film
blurb: A Boy and Girl meet for their second date. Boy is forward, Girl seems nervous. But Girl isn't nervous for the reason we might think...

name: Sanako
